description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' for the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface, utilizing Google Mock framework for unit testing. It primarily declares mocked methods to simulate and verify interactions with a service shell in the WPEFramework. The file includes licensing information, header guards, and necessary includes.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IShell interface for testing purposes within the WPEFramework plugin system.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string for the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks whether a feature is supported, given a uint8_t identifier.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request or task identified by uint32_t.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface using a callsign.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Checks if the service runs in the background.

methods.name: ProxyStubPath
methods.description: Returns the stub path for proxies.

methods.name: Activate
methods.description: Activates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Deactivate
methods.description: Deactivates the service with a reason.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable for a given reason.

methods.name: Reason
methods.description: Returns or indicates the reason for a particular state.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets configuration using a string parameter.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the start mode of the service.

methods.name: StartMode (second variant)
methods.description: Sets the start mode of the service.

methods.name: Resumed (second variant)
methods.description: Sets the resumed state of the service.
